patthana13.12:1.1_0: Parittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naparitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.12:1.1_1: Parittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca namahaggato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.12:1.1_2: Parittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naappamāṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.12:1.1_3: Parittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naparitto ca naappamāṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.12:1.1_4: Parittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca namahaggato ca naappamāṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.12:2.1_0: Mahaggataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca namahaggato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.12:2.1_1: Mahaggataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naparitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.12:2.1_2: Mahaggataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naappamāṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.12:2.1_3: Mahaggataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naparitto ca naappamāṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.12:2.1_4: Mahaggataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca namahaggato ca naappamāṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.12:3.1_0: Appamāṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naappamāṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.12:3.1_1: Appamāṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naparitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.12:3.1_2: Appamāṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca namahaggato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.12:3.1_3: Appamāṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca namahaggato ca naappamāṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.12:3.1_4: Appamāṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naparitto ca namahaggato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.12:4.1_0: Parittañca appamāṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca namahaggato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.12:4.1_1: Parittañca appamāṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naappamāṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.12:4.1_2: Parittañca appamāṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca namahaggato ca naappamāṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.12:5.1_0: Parittañca mahaggatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naparitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.12:5.1_1: Parittañca mahaggatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca namahaggato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.12:5.1_2: Parittañca mahaggatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naappamāṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.12:5.1_3: Parittañca mahaggatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naparitto ca naappamāṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.12:5.1_4: Parittañca mahaggatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca namahaggato ca naappamāṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.12:6.1_0: Hetuyā tevīsa, ārammaṇe cuddasa, adhipatiyā ekūnavīsa …pe…
